attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that it is about time lucky charms cereal where brough back to this country ,there are far worse health implications through abuse of other popular products avalible on the market , to me i could never understand the reasons people abuse caffine drinks and no one bats an eyelid there still widely avalible and the product range is growing .but to be honest the ban has stood for years with lucky charms , Its not as if the government cannot benefit from bringing something that would be a high demand product think of the tax you can add like you do to everything else ,possibly this could create jobs if they were manufactured in this country.

rejection.details: Has no point about Government policy.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
